title: ChronosAI
description: ChronosAI is an AI-powered collaborative coding platform that enables developers to ideate, scaffold, and build projects with real-time AI assistance and team collaboration tools.
body:
const{Fragment:n,jsx:e,jsxs:i}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(r){const a={a:"a",br:"br",em:"em",h2:"h2",hr:"hr",img:"img",li:"li",ol:"ol",p:"p",span:"span",strong:"strong",ul:"ul",...r.components};return i(n,{children:[i(a.h2,{id:"overview",children:[e(a.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#overview",children:e(a.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})}),"Overview"]}),"
",i(a.p,{children:[e(a.strong,{children:"ChronosAI"})," is a full-stack developer platform that merges real-time AI-assisted coding with team collaboration capabilities. Designed for engineers, product builders, and learners, it transforms abstract ideas into structured, functional codebases with minimal manual effort. By combining conversational AI, live collaboration, and intelligent project scaffolding, ChronosAI offers a streamlined, scalable development environment built for speed and productivity."]}),"
",e("br",{}),"
",e("video",{muted:!0,autoPlay:!0,loop:!0,className:"w-full rounded-lg border aspect-video",poster:"/static/chr1-0ec48d.png",children:e("source",{src:"/static/chrDemo-831612.mov",type:"video/mp4"})}),"
",e(a.hr,{}),"
",i(a.h2,{id:"platform-preview",children:[e(a.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#platform-preview",children:e(a.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})}),"Platform Preview"]}),"
",i(a.p,{children:[e(a.img,{src:"/static/chr2-e42348.png",alt:"ChronosAI Workspace – Scaffolding and AI Chat"}),e(a.br,{}),"
",e(a.em,{children:"Figure 1: AI-assisted command execution and intelligent code generation interface."})]}),"
",e(a.hr,{}),"
",i(a.h2,{id:"key-capabilities",children:[e(a.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#key-capabilities",children:e(a.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})}),"Key Capabilities"]}),"
",i(a.ol,{children:["
",i(a.li,{children:["
",i(a.p,{children:[e(a.strong,{children:"Intelligent Project Scaffolding"}),e(a.br,{}),"
","Developers can describe an app idea (e.g., “a real-time chat with authentication”), and ChronosAI generates a complete directory structure and starter code tailored to that use case."]}),"
"]}),"
",i(a.li,{children:["
",i(a.p,{children:[e(a.strong,{children:"Real-Time AI-Powered Chat"}),e(a.br,{}),"
","Integrated with Google’s Gemini API, ChronosAI provides conversational support for code generation, debugging, architecture decisions, and documentation writing."]}),"
"]}),"
",i(a.li,{children:["
",i(a.p,{children:[e(a.strong,{children:"Live Collaboration Environment"}),e(a.br,{}),"
","Built-in socket-based infrastructure enables real-time communication and editing. Teammates can chat, review code, and co-develop within the same session."]}),"
"]}),"
",i(a.li,{children:["
",i(a.p,{children:[e(a.strong,{children:"Instant Code Review and Suggestions"}),e(a.br,{}),"
","Developers receive AI-driven code quality feedback and optimization suggestions while writing or pasting code."]}),"
"]}),"
",i(a.li,{children:["
",i(a.p,{children:[e(a.strong,{children:"Multi-Modal Communication Layer"}),e(a.br,{}),"
","Code snippets, system prompts, and team discussions are unified in a persistent collaborative workspace."]}),"
"]}),"
",i(a.li,{children:["
",i(a.p,{children:[e(a.strong,{children:"Streamlined Architecture"}),e(a.br,{}),"
","Full separation of concerns between frontend and backend, built with scalability and extensibility in mind."]}),"
"]}),"
"]}),"
",e(a.hr,{}),"
",i(a.h2,{id:"technology-stack",children:[e(a.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#technology-stack",children:e(a.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})}),"Technology Stack"]}),"
",i(a.ul,{children:["
",i(a.li,{children:[e(a.strong,{children:"Frontend"}),": React (Vite), TailwindCSS"]}),"
",i(a.li,{children:[e(a.strong,{children:"Backend"}),": Node.js, Express.js"]}),"
",i(a.li,{children:[e(a.strong,{children:"Database"}),": MongoDB with Mongoose"]}),"
",i(a.li,{children:[e(a.strong,{children:"Real-time Communication"}),": Socket.io"]}),"
",i(a.li,{children:[e(a.strong,{children:"AI Integration"}),": Google Gemini API"]}),"
",i(a.li,{children:[e(a.strong,{children:"Caching Layer"}),": Redis"]}),"
"]}),"
",e(a.p,{children:"The frontend and backend are modularized and container-ready, allowing for rapid deployment and horizontal scaling in multi-user environments."}),"
",e(a.hr,{}),"
",i(a.h2,{id:"contribution",children:[e(a.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#contribution",children:e(a.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})}),"Contribution"]}),"
",e(a.p,{children:"ChronosAI is an open-source initiative aimed at building more fluid and AI-augmented developer experiences. Contributions are welcome—whether in feature development, UX design, bug fixes, or performance tuning."}),"
",i(a.p,{children:["View the repository: ",e(a.a,{href:"https://github.com/sehajmakkar/ChronosAI",children:"GitHub – sehajmakkar/ChronosAI"})]}),"
",e(a.hr,{}),"
",i(a.h2,{id:"contact",children:[e(a.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#contact",children:e(a.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})}),"Contact"]}),"
",i(a.ul,{children:["
",i(a.li,{children:[e(a.strong,{children:"GitHub"}),": ",e(a.a,{href:"https://github.com/sehajmakkar",children:"sehajmakkar"})]}),"
",i(a.li,{children:[e(a.strong,{children:"X/Twitter"}),": ",e(a.a,{href:"https://x.com/sehajmakkarr",children:"@sehajmakkarr"})]}),"
",i(a.li,{children:[e(a.strong,{children:"Email"}),": ",e(a.a,{href:"mailto:sehajmakkar007@gmail.com",children:"sehajmakkar007@gmail.com"})]}),"
"]}),"
",e(a.hr,{}),"
",e(a.p,{children:e(a.em,{children:"ChronosAI is designed to empower developers by combining automation, collaboration, and intelligent assistance into a single development environment."})})]})}return{default:function(n={}){const{wrapper:i}=n.components||{};return i?e(i,{...n,children:e(_createMdxContent,{...n})}):_createMdxContent(n)}};

title: DocTime
description: DocTime is a role-based, multi-panel doctor appointment booking platform supporting users, doctors, and administrators, built with the MERN stack.
body:
const{Fragment:n,jsx:e,jsxs:i}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(r){const a={a:"a",br:"br",em:"em",h2:"h2",hr:"hr",li:"li",ol:"ol",p:"p",span:"span",strong:"strong",ul:"ul",...r.components};return i(n,{children:[i(a.h2,{id:"what-is-doctime",children:[e(a.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#what-is-doctime",children:e(a.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})}),"What is DocTime?"]}),"
",i(a.p,{children:[e(a.strong,{children:"DocTime"})," is a full-stack appointment management platform designed for the healthcare sector, supporting ",e(a.strong,{children:"role-based access control (RBAC)"})," across three distinct panels: user, doctor, and admin. With dedicated interfaces and functionalities for each role, DocTime enables seamless patient-doctor interaction, streamlined appointment scheduling, and centralized administrative oversight."]}),"
",e(a.hr,{}),"
",i(a.h2,{id:"feature-preview",children:[e(a.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#feature-preview",children:e(a.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})}),"Feature Preview"]}),"
",e("br",{}),"
",i("div",{className:"flex flex-wrap gap-5 justify-center w-full",children:[e("img",{width:"45%",className:"rounded-lg mx-10 ",src:"/static/doc2-4f069b.png"}),e("img",{width:"45%",className:"rounded-lg mx-10 ",src:"/static/doc3-8e0c32.png"}),e("img",{width:"45%",className:"rounded-lg mx-10 ",src:"/static/doc4-c42bb9.png"}),e("img",{width:"45%",className:"rounded-lg mx-10 ",src:"/static/doc5-6adb7f.png"})]}),"
",e(a.hr,{}),"
",i(a.h2,{id:"system-features",children:[e(a.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#system-features",children:e(a.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})}),"System Features"]}),"
",i(a.ol,{children:["
",i(a.li,{children:["
",i(a.p,{children:[e(a.strong,{children:"Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)"}),e(a.br,{}),"
","Every route and interface is protected according to user role, ensuring secure and context-appropriate access."]}),"
"]}),"
",i(a.li,{children:["
",i(a.p,{children:[e(a.strong,{children:"Separation of Concerns via Multi-Panel Design"}),e(a.br,{}),"
","Individual frontends for users and admins enable clean separation of concerns, improving both scalability and maintainability."]}),"
"]}),"
",i(a.li,{children:["
",i(a.p,{children:[e(a.strong,{children:"Dynamic Doctor Search and Booking"}),e(a.br,{}),"
","Users can filter doctors by specialization and availability, then seamlessly book appointments with real-time updates."]}),"
"]}),"
",i(a.li,{children:["
",i(a.p,{children:[e(a.strong,{children:"Doctor Availability Management"}),e(a.br,{}),"
","Doctors can define their schedules, block off times, and manage consultations directly from their dashboards."]}),"
"]}),"
",i(a.li,{children:["
",i(a.p,{children:[e(a.strong,{children:"Administrative Control and Analytics"}),e(a.br,{}),"
","Admins can approve doctors, track global appointments, manage specializations, and access platform-wide metrics."]}),"
"]}),"
",i(a.li,{children:["
",i(a.p,{children:[e(a.strong,{children:"Cloud Integration for Media Storage"}),e(a.br,{}),"
","Profile and certification uploads are stored securely using ",e(a.strong,{children:"Cloudinary"}),", with ",e(a.strong,{children:"Multer"})," handling upload processing."]}),"
"]}),"
"]}),"
",e(a.hr,{}),"
",i(a.h2,{id:"technology-stack",children:[e(a.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#technology-stack",children:e(a.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})}),"Technology Stack"]}),"
",e(a.p,{children:e(a.strong,{children:"Frontend"})}),"
",i(a.ul,{children:["
",i(a.li,{children:[e(a.strong,{children:"React.js"})," – Component-based user interface"]}),"
",i(a.li,{children:[e(a.strong,{children:"Vite"})," – Lightning-fast build tool and development server"]}),"
",i(a.li,{children:[e(a.strong,{children:"CSS3"})," – Modular styling and UI responsiveness"]}),"
",i(a.li,{children:[e(a.strong,{children:"Context API"})," – Lightweight state management"]}),"
"]}),"
",e(a.p,{children:e(a.strong,{children:"Backend"})}),"
",i(a.ul,{children:["
",i(a.li,{children:[e(a.strong,{children:"Node.js"})," – Asynchronous runtime for scalable server logic"]}),"
",i(a.li,{children:[e(a.strong,{children:"Express.js"})," – RESTful API routing and middleware management"]}),"
",i(a.li,{children:[e(a.strong,{children:"MongoDB with Mongoose"})," – NoSQL database schema design"]}),"
"]}),"
",e(a.p,{children:e(a.strong,{children:"Supporting Libraries and Services"})}),"
",i(a.ul,{children:["
",i(a.li,{children:[e(a.strong,{children:"Cloudinary"})," – Cloud-hosted image storage and CDN"]}),"
",i(a.li,{children:[e(a.strong,{children:"Multer"})," – Middleware for handling file uploads"]}),"
",i(a.li,{children:[e(a.strong,{children:"JWT (JSON Web Tokens)"})," – Secure token-based authentication"]}),"
",i(a.li,{children:[e(a.strong,{children:"bcrypt"})," – Password hashing for credential security"]}),"
"]}),"
",e(a.hr,{}),"
",i(a.h2,{id:"authentication-and-access-control",children:[e(a.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#authentication-and-access-control",children:e(a.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})}),"Authentication and Access Control"]}),"
",e(a.p,{children:"DocTime implements a secure authentication and authorization flow:"}),"
",i(a.ul,{children:["
",i(a.li,{children:[e(a.strong,{children:"JWT-based authentication"})," ensures tokenized access for all user types."]}),"
",e(a.li,{children:"Middleware enforces access control policies based on assigned roles."}),"
",e(a.li,{children:"Sensitive routes are protected using scoped route guards to prevent unauthorized data access or manipulation."}),"
"]}),"
",e(a.p,{children:"Each user role operates on an isolated interface and API layer, minimizing risk and maintaining a coherent permission boundary."}),"
",e(a.hr,{}),"
",i(a.h2,{id:"contribution",children:[e(a.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#contribution",children:e(a.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})}),"Contribution"]}),"
",e(a.p,{children:"DocTime is open to community contributions. Developers can extend functionality across any panel, improve RBAC workflows, integrate payment systems, or enhance analytics."}),"
",i(a.p,{children:["Visit the repository to get started:",e(a.br,{}),"
",e(a.a,{href:"https://github.com/sehajmakkar/DocTime",children:"GitHub – sehajmakkar/DocTime"})]}),"
",e(a.hr,{}),"
",i(a.h2,{id:"contact",children:[e(a.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#contact",children:e(a.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})}),"Contact"]}),"
",i(a.ul,{children:["
",i(a.li,{children:[e(a.strong,{children:"GitHub"}),": ",e(a.a,{href:"https://github.com/sehajmakkar",children:"sehajmakkar"})]}),"
",i(a.li,{children:[e(a.strong,{children:"Email"}),": ",e(a.a,{href:"mailto:sehajmakkar007@gmail.com",children:"sehajmakkar007@gmail.com"})]}),"
",i(a.li,{children:[e(a.strong,{children:"X (Twitter)"}),": ",e(a.a,{href:"https://x.com/sehajmakkarr",children:"@sehajmakkarr"})]}),"
"]}),"
",e(a.hr,{}),"
",e(a.p,{children:e(a.em,{children:"DocTime provides a scalable, production-ready foundation for healthcare appointment management, with emphasis on user segmentation, modular architecture, and secure operational workflows."})})]})}return{default:function(n={}){const{wrapper:i}=n.components||{};return i?e(i,{...n,children:e(_createMdxContent,{...n})}):_createMdxContent(n)}};

title: GenomicsAI
description: GenomicsAI is an AI-driven genomic analysis platform that predicts the clinical impact of genetic mutations using the Evo 2 genomic language model.
body:
const{Fragment:e,jsx:n,jsxs:i}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(r){const a={a:"a",br:"br",em:"em",h2:"h2",hr:"hr",img:"img",li:"li",ol:"ol",p:"p",span:"span",strong:"strong",ul:"ul",...r.components};return i(e,{children:[i(a.h2,{id:"overview",children:[n(a.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#overview",children:n(a.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})}),"Overview"]}),"
",i(a.p,{children:[n(a.strong,{children:"GenomicsAI"})," is a full-stack AI-powered web platform for interpreting genetic mutations at scale. It leverages the ",n(a.strong,{children:"Evo 2 genomic language model"}),"—a transformer-based model trained on over 9 trillion nucleotides—to accurately predict whether single nucleotide variants (SNVs) are likely to be pathogenic. The platform is engineered for clinicians, bioinformaticians, and researchers aiming to accelerate genetic variant classification in clinical and research pipelines."]}),"
",n("br",{}),"
",n("video",{muted:!0,autoPlay:!0,loop:!0,className:"w-full rounded-lg border aspect-video",poster:"/static/gen1-75c95c.png",children:n("source",{src:"/static/genDemo-c407b8.mp4",type:"video/mp4"})}),"
",n(a.hr,{}),"
",i(a.h2,{id:"problem-context",children:[n(a.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#problem-context",children:n(a.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})}),"Problem Context"]}),"
",i(a.p,{children:["In clinical genomics, interpreting the functional impact of genetic mutations—especially ",n(a.strong,{children:"single nucleotide variants (SNVs)"}),"—remains a significant bottleneck. Current challenges include:"]}),"
",i(a.ul,{children:["
",i(a.li,{children:[n(a.strong,{children:"Variants of Uncertain Significance (VUS):"})," A substantial percentage of detected variants cannot be classified as benign or pathogenic due to lack of data."]}),"
",i(a.li,{children:[n(a.strong,{children:"Latency in Clinical Validation:"})," Confirming the pathogenicity of variants typically requires longitudinal clinical studies, functional assays, or case-control analyses—processes that are expensive and time-intensive."]}),"
",i(a.li,{children:[n(a.strong,{children:"Manual Curation Limitations:"})," Relying solely on databases such as ClinVar or literature searches often yields incomplete or outdated interpretations."]}),"
",i(a.li,{children:[n(a.strong,{children:"Scaling Interpretation Pipelines:"})," Most labs lack scalable, real-time computational tools to support genome-wide variant analysis."]}),"
"]}),"
",n(a.hr,{}),"
",i(a.h2,{id:"solution",children:[n(a.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#solution",children:n(a.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})}),"Solution"]}),"
",i(a.p,{children:["GenomicsAI addresses these limitations by providing a ",n(a.strong,{children:"real-time, AI-powered platform"})," for predicting the pathogenicity of SNVs. Built on a serverless, GPU-accelerated architecture, it allows users to:"]}),"
",i(a.ul,{children:["
",i(a.li,{children:["Rapidly ",n(a.strong,{children:"input and analyze SNVs"})," using the Evo 2 model, which captures evolutionary and functional context."]}),"
",i(a.li,{children:[n(a.strong,{children:"Compare predictions"})," against existing clinical evidence from authoritative sources like ",n(a.strong,{children:"ClinVar"}),"."]}),"
",i(a.li,{children:["Interact with reference gene sequences and genomic coordinates using data from the ",n(a.strong,{children:"UCSC Genome Browser API"}),"."]}),"
",i(a.li,{children:["Receive ",n(a.strong,{children:"confidence metrics"})," that quantify the likelihood of a prediction being correct, aiding downstream decision-making in clinical genomics workflows."]}),"
"]}),"
",n(a.p,{children:"This platform shifts variant interpretation from slow, manual evaluation to high-throughput, AI-assisted triage—bridging the gap between raw genomic data and clinical insight."}),"
",n(a.hr,{}),"
",i(a.h2,{id:"demonstration",children:[n(a.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#demonstration",children:n(a.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})}),"Demonstration"]}),"
",i(a.p,{children:[n(a.img,{src:"/static/gen2-5b623a.png",alt:"Gene sequence visualization and mutation input"}),n(a.br,{}),"
",n(a.em,{children:"Figure 1: Interactive gene sequence viewer and variant input interface."})]}),"
",i(a.p,{children:[n(a.img,{src:"/static/gen3-e776e9.png",alt:"AI prediction results compared with ClinVar data"}),n(a.br,{}),"
",n(a.em,{children:"Figure 2: Evo 2 model predictions contextualized alongside ClinVar database annotations."})]}),"
",n(a.hr,{}),"
",i(a.h2,{id:"key-features",children:[n(a.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#key-features",children:n(a.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})}),"Key Features"]}),"
",i(a.ol,{children:["
",i(a.li,{children:["
",i(a.p,{children:[n(a.strong,{children:"AI-Based Variant Pathogenicity Prediction"}),n(a.br,{}),"
","Submit SNVs (e.g., G → A at chr13:32972790) and receive Evo 2 model outputs classifying the variant as likely benign or pathogenic."]}),"
"]}),"
",i(a.li,{children:["
",i(a.p,{children:[n(a.strong,{children:"ClinVar Integration"}),n(a.br,{}),"
","Predictions are mapped against entries from the ",n(a.strong,{children:"NCBI ClinVar"})," database to show known clinical assertions for the queried variant."]}),"
"]}),"
",i(a.li,{children:["
",i(a.p,{children:[n(a.strong,{children:"Gene Search and Genomic Navigation"}),n(a.br,{}),"
","Users can search by gene symbols (e.g., TP53, BRCA1) or browse genomic regions by coordinates. Reference sequences are rendered interactively using UCSC API data."]}),"
"]}),"
",i(a.li,{children:["
",i(a.p,{children:[n(a.strong,{children:"Interactive Sequence Viewer"}),n(a.br,{}),"
","Visualize gene-level DNA sequences, zoom into specific positions, and annotate them with mutation details."]}),"
"]}),"
",i(a.li,{children:["
",i(a.p,{children:[n(a.strong,{children:"Prediction Confidence Scores"}),n(a.br,{}),"
","Each AI prediction includes a numerical confidence score derived from Evo 2’s model logits, assisting in result prioritization."]}),"
"]}),"
",i(a.li,{children:["
",i(a.p,{children:[n(a.strong,{children:"High-Performance, Serverless Backend"}),n(a.br,{}),"
","Inference is executed on H100 GPUs using ",n(a.strong,{children:"Modal"}),", allowing for fast, scalable, and cost-effective predictions."]}),"
"]}),"
",i(a.li,{children:["
",i(a.p,{children:[n(a.strong,{children:"Fully Responsive UI"}),n(a.br,{}),"
","Built with ",n(a.strong,{children:"Next.js 15"}),", ",n(a.strong,{children:"TypeScript"}),", and ",n(a.strong,{children:"Shadcn UI"}),", the interface is optimized for both research-grade usability and mobile responsiveness."]}),"
"]}),"
"]}),"
",n(a.hr,{}),"
",i(a.h2,{id:"technology-stack",children:[n(a.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#technology-stack",children:n(a.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})}),"Technology Stack"]}),"
",i(a.ul,{children:["
",i(a.li,{children:[n(a.strong,{children:"AI Model"}),": Evo 2 (Stanford, UCSF, Berkeley, NVIDIA)"]}),"
",i(a.li,{children:[n(a.strong,{children:"Frontend"}),": Next.js 15, React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Shadcn UI"]}),"
",i(a.li,{children:[n(a.strong,{children:"Backend"}),": Python, FastAPI, serverless runtime on Modal (H100 GPU)"]}),"
",i(a.li,{children:[n(a.strong,{children:"Data Sources"}),": UCSC Genome Browser, NCBI E-utilities, ClinVar"]}),"
"]}),"
",n(a.hr,{}),"
",i(a.h2,{id:"the-evo-2-model",children:[n(a.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#the-evo-2-model",children:n(a.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})}),"The Evo 2 Model"]}),"
",i(a.p,{children:["At the core of GenomicsAI is ",n(a.strong,{children:"Evo 2"}),", a transformer-based genomic language model purpose-built for modeling DNA sequences and predicting mutational impacts."]}),"
",i(a.ul,{children:["
",i(a.li,{children:[n(a.strong,{children:"Training Corpus"}),": 9.3 trillion nucleotides across 128,000 species"]}),"
",i(a.li,{children:[n(a.strong,{children:"Architectural Foundation"}),": Transformer blocks with tokenization tailored for genomic alphabets"]}),"
",i(a.li,{children:[n(a.strong,{children:"Capabilities"}),": Mutation impact prediction, de novo genome sequence generation, and in silico genome design"]}),"
",i(a.li,{children:[n(a.strong,{children:"Research Origin"}),": Developed by Stanford University, UC Berkeley, UCSF, and NVIDIA (",n(a.a,{href:"https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/2025.02.18.638918v1.full.pdf",children:"View Paper"}),")"]}),"
"]}),"
",n(a.hr,{}),"
",i(a.h2,{id:"contribution",children:[n(a.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#contribution",children:n(a.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})}),"Contribution"]}),"
",n(a.p,{children:"GenomicsAI is an open-source initiative built to advance genomic research and AI-assisted variant interpretation. Contributions are welcomed across all areas—frontend, backend, model integration, UI design, and data pipeline improvements."}),"
",i(a.p,{children:["Explore the repository: ",n(a.a,{href:"https://github.com/sehajmakkar/GenomicsAI",children:"GitHub – sehajmakkar/GenomicsAI"})]}),"
",n(a.hr,{}),"
",i(a.h2,{id:"contact",children:[n(a.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#contact",children:n(a.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})}),"Contact"]}),"
",i(a.ul,{children:["
",i(a.li,{children:[n(a.strong,{children:"GitHub"}),": ",n(a.a,{href:"https://github.com/sehajmakkar",children:"sehajmakkar"})]}),"
",i(a.li,{children:[n(a.strong,{children:"Email"}),": ",n(a.a,{href:"mailto:sehajmakkar007@gmail.com",children:"sehajmakkar007@gmail.com"})]}),"
",i(a.li,{children:[n(a.strong,{children:"X/Twitter"}),": ",n(a.a,{href:"https://x.com/sehajmakkarr",children:"@sehajmakkarr"})]}),"
"]}),"
",n(a.hr,{}),"
",n(a.p,{children:n(a.em,{children:"GenomicsAI is purpose-built to reduce interpretation latency in genomics workflows through the integration of scalable infrastructure and cutting-edge AI."})})]})}return{default:function(e={}){const{wrapper:i}=e.components||{};return i?n(i,{...e,children:n(_createMdxContent,{...e})}):_createMdxContent(e)}};

title: Kryptic AI - LLM Interface
description: A modern landing interface for an upcoming Open Source LLM with amazing hover animations, gradient and modern aesthetic.

title: Opal - SAAS Landing Page
description: A modern and aesthetic landing page in light mode with Pricing, Product Showcase, Call to Action components built with Animations, Parallax Effects using NextJS ,Framer Motion and Tailwind CSS.

title: ScreamShots
description: Transform ordinary screenshots to screaming mockups to share on social media and get extraordinary reactions!
